short_description: LIGHTWEIGHT HOLD FOR DAILY USE – Keep your hair looking fresh and natural with this hairspray designed for women and men. The fine spray delivers a humidity‑resistant hold, perfect for styling, volume, and texture. Ideal for better everyday looks, from casual styles to polished finishes.

FINE SPRAY FOR NATURAL FINISH – Achieve a smooth, even mist that dries quickly without weighing hair down. This fine spray hairspray enhances styling control, giving you long‑lasting body and movement. Perfect for men and women who want better hair days without heavy residue.

HUMIDITY RESISTANT STYLING – Maintain your style with a humidity-defying formula that resists frizz and keeps texture defined. Perfect for everyday looks, this hairspray balances firm hold with flexible movement for long-lasting results.

EASY TO USE FOR MEN AND WOMEN – Enjoy hassle‑free styling with this lightweight hairspray. Whether you’re looking to boost volume, add texture, or create a polished finish, this fine spray formula makes it simple. Ideal for travel, daily use, or whenever your hair needs better control.

name: TIGI Bed Head Salty Not Sorry texturizing Salt Spray for Natural Undone Hairstyles 3.38 fl oz
short_description: POWERFUL SEA SALT TEXTURE SPRAY: A pro texturising sea salt spray for beach waves, messy hair, volume, grip and natural texture. Ideal for wavy hair, curly hair, fine hair and all hair types wanting effortless, undone and tousled styles

NATURAL BEACH WAVE FINISH: Creates soft, undone beach waves, messy hairstyles and textured volume. An excellent styling spray for tousled, just-got-out-of-bed looks, adding movement, definition and lightweight hold to short, medium or long hair

ANTI-FRIZZ & HUMIDITY PROTECTION: Sea salt spray that fights frizz, flyaways and humidity while boosting texture and grip. Great for smooth, defined, beachy hairstyles with long-lasting control, volume and natural-looking movement

FLEXIBLE HOLD & HYDRATION: Texturising spray with flexible hold for wavy, curly or straight hair. Adds volume, lift and definition without crunch, plus deep hydration with glycerin to keep hair soft, moisturised and easy to style

DEAD SEA SALT GRIP & TEXTURE: Infused with Dead Sea Salt for authentic beach texture, grip and matte finish. A great hair styling spray for scrunching, twisting and shaping natural waves, creating effortless, beachy, voluminous hair
product_description: BED HEAD BY TIGI SALTY NOT SORRY HAIR TEXTURISING SALT SPRAY Achieve effortless, salon-quality beach waves with Salty Not Sorry, the ultimate sea salt spray for tousled, undone hairstyles. Designed with and used by professional stylists, this powerful texturising spray adds instant grip, texture, and volume to all hair types. Whether you want messy, just-got-out-of-bed hair, natural-looking waves, or voluminous styles, this spray delivers long-lasting results with flexible hold that feels light and touchable. Beach-Inspired Texture, Natural Matte Finish: Infused with Dead Sea Salt, Salty Not Sorry enhances hair texture while creating natural, beach-inspired waves. The lightweight formula boosts volume and body, adds grip for easier styling, and gives hair that authentic, undone, wavy look. Great for creating tousled hairstyles, enhancing curls, or adding movement to straight hair. Frizz Protection with Lasting Hydration: This professional texturising spray protects hair from frizz and the effects of humidity, keeping styles smooth and polished without stiffness or heaviness. Glycerin in the formula locks in moisture for deep hydration, preventing dryness and leaving hair soft, silky, and touchably healthy. Flexible Hold, Effortless Movement: The flexible hold ensures hair stays in place while retaining natural movement, so your waves, curls, or textured styles look effortless and free-flowing all day. Pairs excellently with other styling products for enhanced results. Bold Floral Fragrance: Features an opulent floral fragrance that leaves hair smelling fresh while styling. Ideal for everyday use or special occasions, bringing professional salon results into your home. How to Use: Spray over damp or dry hair from roots to ends, 10–12 inches away Scrunch, twist, diffuse, or air dry to create your desired beachy texture Suitable for all lengths and hair types Layer with volumising sprays or hair oils for enhanced results
